mapLocationData.name: Cliffside Outlook
mapLocationData.description: The dark figure leads you out to the edge of a scenic cliffside.

interactionlessDialographyDatas.locationDescSummary: This is where you were betrayed and abandoned by that strange being.

missionData.name: Forged In Fire
missionData.description: After battling the mysterous being for a time, it called for a truse and led you to a cliff overlooking a large village. It spoke of wicked ambitions and of cryptic destinies. And then without warning, it cast you off the cliff face. You landed in a body of water far below, leaving you to your own devices.

dialogLines.dialogText: Do you see that city in the distance there?
You are akin to that place, embedded and glowing throughout the night of this great woodland.
It is your right to grow stronger and seize your true destiny, like the city consuming the wilds to build itself higher.
Take that thirsty gift of war and use it to cleave such a path through this land that all will know your reign.
The figure steps back and, as you turn to face them, they swiftly kick you off the cliff's edge!!!

mapLocationData.name: Peak
mapLocationData.description: The cold and bleak mountain peak. The thin air both invigorating and dizzying.
